scripts.copy-lc-comp: npx shx mkdir -p ../public/showcase/libs && npx shx cp -fr ../node_modules/monaco-editor-comp/bundle ../public/showcase/libs/monaco-editor-comp
scripts.copy-monaco-workers: npx shx mkdir -p ../public/showcase/libs && npx shx cp -fr ../node_modules/monaco-editor-workers/dist ../public/showcase/libs/monaco-editor-workers
scripts.copy-monaco-editor: npx shx mkdir -p ../public/showcase/libs && npx shx cp -fr ../node_modules/monaco-editor ../public/showcase/libs/monaco-editor
scripts.copy-index: npx shx mkdir -p ../public/showcase && npx shx cp -fr ./static/* ../public/showcase
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-index && npm run copy-lc-comp && npm run copy-monaco-workers && npm run copy-monaco-editor
